replies.bodyText: Yeah, this was one of the sys.exit calls that was more difficult to pull out. Shouldn't be too much work - I would pull the if generate_config check into the cli.cli() function, call config_resolver.generate_config() from there, and do an early return. But no worries if that seems like too much here.
